mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificate ( member_id, course_id, completion_date, status, filename ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{courseId}, #{completionDate}, #{status}, #{filename} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.certificate_id AS certificateId, c.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS nickname, co.course_id AS courseId, co.course_name AS courseName, a.academy_name AS academyName, c.completion_date AS completionDate, c.status, c.filename FROM certificate c JOIN course co ON c.course_id = co.course_id JOIN academy a ON co.academy_id = a.academy_id JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT c.certificate_id AS certificateId, c.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS nickname, co.course_id AS courseId, co.course_name AS courseName, a.academy_name AS academyName, c.completion_date AS completionDate, c.status, c.filename FROM certificate c JOIN course co ON c.course_id = co.course_id JOIN academy a ON co.academy_id = a.academy_id JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY c.completion_date DESC
